metadata.name: betfun
metadata.description: BetFun Arena - Prediction market battles on Solana

instructions.name: add_liquidity
docs: Add liquidity to an AMM pool

accounts.name: buyer_token_account
docs: User's token account to receive shares

accounts.name: order_escrow
docs: Escrow account holding tokens/SOL for the order

instructions.name: claim_winnings
docs: Claim winnings after arena is resolved

accounts.name: creator
docs: Creator receives fees (only transferred once, on first claim)

instructions.name: create_share_tokens
docs: Create SPL token mints for each outcome of an arena

accounts.name: creator
docs: Creator must sign to create share tokens

accounts.name: share_mint
docs: SPL token mint for this outcome

instructions.name: initialize_pool
docs: Initialize an AMM pool for an outcome

accounts.name: share_mint
docs: The share mint account (must match outcome_share.token_mint)

instructions.name: join_arena
docs: Join an arena by betting on an outcome

instructions.name: place_limit_order
docs: Place a limit order in the order book

accounts.name: order_escrow
docs: Escrow account to hold tokens/SOL for the order

instructions.name: redeem_shares
docs: Redeem winning outcome shares for SOL after arena resolution

instructions.name: remove_liquidity
docs: Remove liquidity from an AMM pool

instructions.name: resolve_arena
docs: Resolve an arena (creator or oracle only)

accounts.name: resolver
docs: Can be creator or oracle (for automated resolution)

instructions.name: settle_match
docs: Settle a matched order (called by matching engine)

instructions.name: swap
docs: Swap tokens using the AMM pool

types.name: AMMPool
docs: Automated Market Maker (AMM) pool for outcome shares
Uses constant product formula: x * y = k

fields.name: outcome_index
docs: Which outcome this pool is for

fields.name: lp_token_mint
docs: LP token mint for this pool

fields.name: token_mint
docs: Optional token mint for tokenized arenas

types.name: LimitOrder
docs: Limit order in the order book

fields.name: outcome_index
docs: Which outcome this order is for

fields.name: outcome_index
docs: Which outcome this order book is for

types.name: OutcomeShare
docs: Represents a tradable outcome share token
Each outcome in an arena has its own SPL token that can be bought/sold

fields.name: token_mint
docs: SPL token mint for this outcome

fields.name: current_price
docs: Current market price (in lamports per share)
Updated by AMM and order book

fields.name: trophy_mint
docs: Trophy NFT mint (if winner minted trophy)

types.name: ShareBalance
docs: User's share balance for a specific outcome
